page.title: 17SHOPPING:GT.HAYWOOD VILLAGE.
page.content: On the 7th of June 1985,we did a survey on shopping for the Domesday Project in Great Haywood. We interviewed 20 people outside the shops. We found out that most people used the village shops for groceries,provisions and other items. A lot of people did not use the village shops for their main weekly shopping. They mainly used the super- markets because they have a larger choice and they are a lot cheaper.The most used supermarkets are Tesco and Sainsburys. We think that it is important that the shops in the village should stay open because in the future petrol and the cost of bus fares will go up in price. Many people might not be able to afford to get to town,so it is very important that they should stay open.
